text: Vin utvoryv vas z odniyeyi osoby (Adam). Z·hodom, Vin daye kozhna lyudyna tovarysh znakhodyatʹ spokiy z yi. Vona todi nosytʹ svitlyy vantazh shcho vona mozhe ledve pomityty. Yak vantazh pryyizhdzhaye bilʹsh vazhki, vony blahayutʹ BOHA yikhniy Lord: "Yakshcho Vy dayete nam harna dytyna, my budemo appreciative
